item.title: Dumped waste, leftover from homeless use., 14th July
item.description:
Behimd the righthand side of the Joseph Bazalgette Monument, as pictured from across the street, directly 9n the waterfront. There previously was a tent and temporary structure here, used by homeless for drug use, possible NEEDLES. has been abandoned for over a month, Known to myself and security colleagues at Northbank BID security patrol team.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Embankment, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
